about.title: ABOUT US
about.subtitle: Small studio. Weird ideas. Serious games.

slides.text:
BETESHIG studios is an indie game studio driven by a simple belief: great games come from spite, snacks, and an unhealthy attachment to pixel art. We've spent time honing our skills and building our voice — and now we're respawning as a real studio.

We build with Godot, create art in Aseprite, and craft 3D assets in Blender.
Engineering — Adi wrangles code, fights physics engines, and somehow turns spaghetti into shipping software. If it runs, he built it. If it crashes, he's already fixing it.
Art Direction — Mircea turns vague ideas into pixels that slap. From character sprites to full environments, if it looks good, it's because he wouldn't let it not.
5 games, 5 genres, zero sensible ideas. We've been shipping since 2024 and we're not slowing down — every project starts as a wild "what if" and somehow ends up on itch.io before anyone can stop us.

games.title: OUR GAMES
games.subtitle: Worlds waiting to be discovered. Each project is a new adventure.

items.title: Layover: Game Over
items.description: A WarioWare-style game with more than a dozen micro-game blitzes set in the world's most inexplicable airports.

items.title: One Shot to Valhalla
items.description: An Overcooked-style tower defense where you play as Magnus Drunkesson, a drunken Viking defending his closet from skeleton invaders.

items.title: Flatroads
items.description: Top-down retro road construction game. Help Rookie fix the bridge after a hurricane.

items.title: Gravitaxi
items.description: Defeat gravity as a taxi driver from a futuristic dubious collective of transporters.

items.title: Tales of Anunaki
items.description: Anunaki, the creator of planets, was cruising in his BLEEPBARG when the unthinkable happened: it stopped bleeping and barging.
